business.headline: Is AI smart enough to help you make money on Dalal Street?One of the major advantages of using AI is that it takes care of the labour-intensive aspects of trading efficiently, as per experts.

Why is Pakistan planning to legalise cryptocurrency? 3 key reasonsNearly 15-20 million Pakistanis are already trading digital assets. Further, countries like the US and UAE are embracing crypto-friendly policies, making it crucial for Pakistan to stay competitive.

Sensex gains 500 points. 2 reasons behind stock market rallyThe S&P BSE Sensex jumped 508.79 points to trade at 76,856.85 at 11:02 am, while the NSE Nifty50 rose 154.40 points to 23,345.05. Adding to the cheer was the continued rally in smallcap and midcap segments.

Bajaj Finance shares rally over 3% to reach record high, analysts bullishShares of the non-banking financial company rose 3.5% in early trade to reach a day's high of 9,070. At around 10:35 am, shares of the company were trading 2.43% higher at Rs 8,891.15 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).
RVNL shares rise 4% as railway PSU bags Rs 555 crore project. Check detailsThe shares of RVNL were trading 4.18% higher at Rs 373 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).

This woman earned $350 million a day but lost $3.6 billion in 3 daysMarina Bumdiman had accumulated a fortune of $7.5 billion, making her the richest woman in Indonesia. However, the rapid rise was followed by an equally sharp fall. In just three days, her net worth was cut in half, wiping out $3.6 billion.

Ola Electric shares jump over 6% after clarification on February sales dataOla Electric Mobility's share price rose over 6% on the Bombay Stock Exchange in early trade after an important clarification.

Accenture revenue forecast hits IT stocks, Infosys, Wipro fallAccenture, which is seen as a key indicator for the Indian IT sector, raised the lower end of its annual revenue forecast but kept the upper end unchanged.
Sensex, Nifty open lower as IT stocks drag markets down after 4-day rallyThe S&P BSE Sensex was down 98.30 points to 76,249.76, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 21.85 points to 23,168.80 as of 9:25 am.

Ola Electric explains February sales mismatch: Temporary backlog in registrationsOla Electric addressed concerns about the mismatch in a stock exchange filing, saying that daily registrations have now exceeded 50% of its three-month daily sales average.

Sensex, Nifty opening predictions on March 21: What to expect todayBSE, NSE today: Nifty has posted gains for four straight sessions this week, marking its longest winning streak in nearly seven weeks.

Stocks to watch on March 21: TCS, HUL, Zomato, Adani Enterprises, Jio FinancialSeveral stocks will be in focus today due to recent developments. These include Hindustan Unilever (HUL), Jio Financial, Adani Enterprises, Infosys, TCS, Bajaj Finance, Zomato, and others.

entertainment.headline: BTS' J-hope releases Mona Lisa music video, a playful single that's Hobie coded J-hope of BTS launched a new music video, Mona Lisa, which has funky beats and dynamic dance moves. It's a visual feast.

Dhanashree Verma shares song about infidelity, domestic violence after divorceChoregrapher Dhanashree Verma released a new song titled 'Dekha Ji Dekha Maine' on the same day she was granted a divorce from cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal.

Ranbir Kapoor talks about his 'first wife'. No, it isn't Alia BhattRanbir Kapoor shared a bizarre fan story, revealing that a girl once arrived with a Pandit at his bungalow to get married to him. He later joked about meeting his 'first wife.'

Sonakshi Sinha on life with Zaheer Iqbal: Haven't wasted a day since I met himSonakshi Sinha shared a heart-warming 'husband appreciation post' for Zaheer Iqbal, calling him her source of laughter. The couple got married in June 2024.

Mahesh Babu's son Gautam performs mime at New York college, excited fans reactActor Mahesh Babu's son is studying dramatics at New York University. In a video shared by a fan-club, he is seen performing a mime with a girl. The video has now gone viral on social media.

Naga Chaitanya roasts Sobhita Dhulipala: You lack basic human skillsSobhita Dhulipala and Naga Chaitanya shared fun relationship insights, from who apologises first to who is more dramatic when sick. The couple got married in December 2024 in a traditional ceremony.

Mohanlal's Empuraan scripts history in pre-sales, set for a grand openingMohanlal's L2: Empuraan is taking the box office by storm in its pre-sales. According to initial reports, the film has grossed over Rs 12 crore only in the international market.

One Battle After Another teaser: Leonardo DiCaprio brings grit, gunfire in actionerThe teaser trailer of Paul Thomas Anderson's upcoming film with Leonardo DiCaprio was released. Titled One Battle After Another, the action-thriller is set for a September 2025 release.

Aamir Khan's family 'happy' about his relationship with Gauri, says sister NikhatAamir Khan's sister, Nikhat Hegde, said she is happy with his relationship with Gauri Spratt. She also praised Gauri and wished for the couple to stay happy forever.

Kanneda review: Parmish Varma is fantastic in gangster drama beyond guns and goons Released-Fri Mar 21, 2025'Kanneda' is a breath of fresh air in the Indian OTT scene. Singer and actor Parmish Verma bowls you over as an underdog-turned-drug-lord in the 90s 'Kanneda' of the Punjabi immigrants.

Adolescence highlights 'growing problem', must screen in schools: UK Prime MinisterThe UK Prime Minister, Keir Starmer, backed the call for screening Netflix's show Adolescence in schools. The four-part show sheds light on the growing influence of social media on teenage boys.

Adolescence was meant to be a why, not a whodunnit: Actor Stephen GrahamActor Stephen Graham discussed his latest Netflix series, Adolescence, on The Tonight Show. He highlighted how today's generation is exposed to all the information on social media, increasing social accountability. The Netflix series aims to spark a conversation on social influence.

Mahesh Babu's daughter Sitara teaches him Gen-Z lingo in their first collaborationMahesh Babu and his daughter Sitara appeared in their first-ever on-screen collaboration for a clothing brand. In the fun comercial, Sitara can be seen teaching Mahesh Babu Gen-Z words.

Chiranjeevi condemns unauthorised paid fan meets in UK, says no to exploitationMegastar Chiranjeevi warned his fans in United Kingdom about middlemen trying to charge them fees for fan meets. In a post on X, he condemned this behaviour and promised refunds.

Kendall Jenner criticizes Khloe Kardashian's 'cold' behavior towards Lamar OdomKendall Jenner criticized Khloe Kardashian's 'cold' and 'snarky' behavior during her reunion with Lamar Odom. She compared it to Khloe's treatment of Tristan Thompson and admitted she cried watching the episode.

Hollywood release shake-up: Warner Bros. reschedules major films for box office successWarner Bros. has rescheduled major releases, pushing The Bride to 2026 and One Battle After Another to September 2025. These moves aim to boost box office earnings and enhance awards season positioning.

Comedian Samay Raina postpones India tour amid India's Got Latent rowComedian Samay Raina shared a note in his Instagram stories, announcing that he has postponed his India tour. His decision comes weeks after he found himself in the middle of a controversy involving podcaster Ranveer Allahabadia's comments on his YouTube show, 'India's Got Latent'.

Lollapalooza 2025 lineup announced: Olivia Rodrigo, A$AP Rocky, and moreLollapalooza 2025's lineup includes Olivia Rodrigo, A$AP Rocky, Sabrina Carpenter, and Korn. The festival runs from July 31 and promises another exciting mix of top artists.

Khloé Kardashian reveals her beauty secretKhloé Kardashian revealed that she uses salmon sperm into her skincare routine. However, experts remain skeptical due to lack of scientific evidence, and the treatment is not FDA-approved.

general news.headline: Muslim quota bill passed in Karnataka, BJP MLAs tear copy, throw at SpeakerAmid uproar in the Karnataka Assembly over the honey trap case, the Congress passed a Bill granting 4 per cent reservation for Muslims in government contracts, sparking controversy. Congress defended it as inclusive, while the BJP called it unconstitutional and vowed to challenge it legally.

Fire at Delhi judge's bungalow leads to huge cash recovery; he gets transferredJustice Yashwant Verma was sent back to his parent court following the recommendation of the Supreme Court Collegium after the incident came to light.

Meerut woman posed as lover's dead mother on Snapchat, said husband be killed: CopsIn a bizarre twist to the case, Muskan had created three fake Snapchat ID under the name of her brother. She used this account to send messages, convincing Sahil that his mother was speaking to him from the afterlife.

All arrival and departure flights to the airport have been cancelled.

Trump warns Tesla vandals could face 20 years in prison: We are looking for youFollowing a string of attacks on Tesla, US President Donald Trump on Friday warned that those targeting the automobile company could face up to twenty years in jail.

Can a parent's affair shape a child's emotional world?For a child who is in his teens or pre-teens and struggling with numerous things like puberty, peers, and relationships, the revelation of a parent's affair can be a blow big enough to shape how the person grows up emotionally.

India submits bid to host 2030 Commonwealth Games: Sports Ministry SourcesIndia submitted the bid to host the 2030 Commonwealth Games on Thursday, March 20. It's a major step towards achieving India's dream of hosting the 2036 Summer Olympic Games in Ahmedabad.

Virat bhai supported me a lot, was emotional to leave RCB: Mohammed SirajIndia fast bowler Mohammed Siraj said that it was emotional for him to leave Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) after playing with Virat Kohli for seven years, who supported him a lot.

Carlos Alcaraz caught off guard by PTPA lawsuit, says he doesn't support itThe PTPA, an advocacy group established by Novak Djokovic and Vasek Pospisil, filed the lawsuit on Tuesday accusing the ATP, WTA, International Tennis Federation and International Tennis Integrity Agency of anti-competitive practices.

Exclusive: Sreesanth motivates injury-prone Umran Malik with special messageIPL 2025: Speaking to India Today, JioStar expert and former pacer Sreesanth urged Umran Malik to work smarter to recover from injury setbacks and return to action. Umran, who was signed by Kolkata Knight Riders, was ruled out of IPL 2025 due to an injury.

April 6 match between KKR and LSG to shift from Kolkata to GuwahatiIPL 2025: The April 6 game between Kolkata Knight Riders and Lucknow Super Giants will be shifted from Kolkata to Guwahati. The decision was taken after Kolkata Police informed the state cricket body that it wouldn't be able to provide adequate security for the game, which coincides with Ram Navami festivities.

IPL captains' meet: Pat Cummins odd man out in photoshoot near Gateway of IndiaIPL 2025: Pat Cummins and Shreyas Iyer took centrestage during the customary captains' photoshoot in Mumbai on Thursday. The new season will get underway in Kolkata on March 22.

Watch: Abhishek Sharma warms up for IPL 2025 by breaking glasses in Hyderabad stadiumIndia and Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) opener Abhishek Sharma broke the glass at the Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium in Hyderabad while practising for the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Watch: Yuzvendra Chahal wears 'be your own sugar daddy' T-shirt to divorce hearingIndia cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal was seen wearing a T-shirt with a message that read 'be your own sugar daddy' during his divorce plea hearing at a family court in Mumbai on Thursday.

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP.
